actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources requested executive comment from Interior Department, Agriculture Department, OMB.

official_title: A bill to make the Grazing Advisory Boards established under the Federal Land Policy Management Act of 1976 permanent.

summary.text: Repeals the expiration date of the Grazing Advisory Boards under the Federal Land Policy Management Act of 1976, thereby making such Boards permanent.

titles.title: A bill to make the Grazing Advisory Boards established under the Federal Land Policy Management Act of 1976 permanent.
